description: Further public health advice will be introduced to combat the spike, the Government of Jersey says.
title: Jersey coronavirus cases 'surge' by 84 over weekend
title_page: Jersey coronavirus cases 'surge' by 84 over weekend - BBC News
maintext: "Health officials are seeing case clusters on a larger scale, and we are worried that the number of positive cases being picked up may indicate an increase in hospitalisation as we move forward.
